properties.description: This pipeline copies data from multiple csv files from data lake to sql tables by filtering  only csv files excluding txt files

activities.name: Get list fo files in a folder

dependsOn.activity: Get list fo files in a folder

items.value: @activity('Get list fo files in a folder').output.childItems

properties.description: Just by using wildcard path, we are going to copy the files to sql table instead filter and for each.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
TRUNCATE TABLE ProductDetail_New
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ProductDetail_New

properties.description: copy the data to table and move the files to archive folder after loading
This pipeline copies the list of table data to txt files to data lake with file name same as table name

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT S.name AS SchemaName, T.name AS TableName
FROM [sys].Tables T 
JOIN SYS.schemas S
	ON T.schema_id = S.schema_id
WHERE Type = 'U'
	AND T.name NOT IN ('BuildVersion','ErrorLog')

activities.name: Copy data from parquet to sql

dependsOn.activity: Copy data from parquet to sql

properties.description: Divert the error records to separate table using data flow
This pipeline writes stats to csv file. On daily basis, for first run it should create a new file with date.csv and next consecutive runs, it should append data.
This implement SCD Type#1 where records will update if exists else insert.
